snippet: The university said that a company hired to monitor work conditions at its Shanghai campus did not comply; workers’ conditions at the Abu Dhabi campus were criticized this spring.
abstract: New York University says procedures intended to protect workers at its Shanghai campus were not properly reviewed by Jones Lang LaSalle, real estate consulting firm hired to conduct labor compliance monitoring at building site; revelation comes amid review of labor conditions at NYU's Abu Dhabi campus.
lead_paragraph: The university said that a company hired to monitor work conditions at its Shanghai campus did not comply; workers’ conditions at the Abu Dhabi campus were criticized this spring.

headline.main: N.Y.U. Faces Worker Protection Issues at Shanghai Campus
headline.print_headline: N.Y.U., Amid Abu Dhabi Review, Faces Worker Protection Issues at a 2nd Outpost
